title: President Obama Requests $6 Billion To Fight Ebola
teaser: The president is asking Congress for money to help fight the Ebola epidemic. We take a look at what the funds will go toward.
contentencoded:
Right before President Barack Obama held his post-election news conference yesterday, he sent a request to Congress for more than $6 billion to help fight the Ebola epidemic.

Juliet Eilperin, White House correspondent for The Washington Post, joins Here & Now’sÂ Jeremy Hobson to discuss what that money will go towards.

Guest

  • Juliet Eilperin, White House correspondent for The Washington Post. She tweets @eilperin.
